description: The TCA cycle mediates the catabolism of acetyl-CoA to yield two molecules of CO2 and reducing equivalents in the form of NADH + H+ and FADH2. In plants, it is also an important source of carbon skeletons for biosynthetic reactions. Description from [http://plantreactome.gramene.org/ Plant Reactome].  Developed by Gramene.org.  Source:[http://plantreactome.gramene.org/ Plant Reactome].
title: TCA cycle (plant)
